name: KITTY•ON•OPNET
description: KittySwap is a cutting-edge decentralized exchange (DEX) and perpetual swap platform built on OP_NET. Designed to offer an unparalleled trading experience, KittySwap allows users to trade OP20 tokens. Our platform leverages OP_NET's robust and secure infrastructure to provide traders with the ability to engage in leveraged trading of OP20 tokens. This opens up new opportunities for both novice and experienced traders. For our swap functionalities, KittySwap is built on top of MotoSwap, utilizing their contracts to ensure that token swaps are seamless and efficient. KittySwap is committed to delivering a top-tier user experience, making complex trading strategies accessible and intuitive. With our platform, users can trade OP20 tokens with leverage, taking advantage of market opportunities while managing their risks effectively. As we continue to evolve, KittySwap aims to integrate with more protocols, further expanding its capabilities and reach within the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem.
